Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.33285267]Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=16 µM); Bacillus subtilis ATCC 23857(MIC=4 µM);Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=8 µM); Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9027(MIC=4 µM); Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 700603(MIC=8 µM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.33285267]15% hemolysis against mouse erythrocytes at 256 µM.
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Structure Description: The CD spectra in water adopts a random-coil conformation,3.56% α-helix was determined in 50% TFE.
Sequence Information.Function: when combined with gentamicin, rifampin, and polymyxin B, it demonstrated synergistic or additive activity against E. coli ATCC 25922 and P. aeruginosa ATCC 9027.

Literature.Title: Newly designed antimicrobial peptides with potent bioactivity and enhanced cell selectivity prevent and reverse rifampin resistance in Gram-negative bacteria.
Literature.Author: Zhu N, Zhong C, Liu T, Zhu Y, Gou S, Bao H, Yao J, Ni J.
